item.description:
Networking Event to Discuss the Life Sciences “Convergent” Technology Landscape

Date: June 1st 2011

Time: 6-9pm

Location:  Nutter McClennen & Fish, LLP, 155 Seaport Blvd Boston MA 02210

To register:  http://lifescienceconvergence2.eventbrite.com/ 

 

This networking event, organized by Propel Careers and Nutter McClennen & Fish, LLP, and hosted at Nutter McClennen & Fish, LLP, is designed to discuss trends and advances in how  life sciences companies develop convergent technologies – i.e. utilizing information technology to transform how medical devices, diagnostics, therapeutics, and overall  medical information is gathered, developed, and used.  This event will discuss exciting uses of this technology and will showcase the need for various skill sets/backgrounds to take these companies to the next level.

 

This event is designed to bring together individuals with diverse backgrounds to be exposed to the many exciting initiatives that the convergent technology companies are spearheading.  

 

During the event, a presentation of the overall “convergence technology” landscape will be given to highlight focus areas and points to consider for firms to develop technologies in this area. This overview will be followed by a panel discussion of leaders in the area to discuss innovative business models, product development strategy, partnership strategy, financing trends and future plans in this area.    

 

Agenda:

6:00pm-6:30pm:      Registration and Open Networking

 

6:30pm-6:45pm:      Welcome and Recognition of Sponsors

 

6:45pm-7:00pm:      Overview of Convergence Landscape

  • Patrick Terry, Principal, Scientia  Advisors

 

7:00pm-8:00pm:      Panel Discussion

  • Karan Singh, Founder, Ginger.io
  • Dustan Bonnin, CEO, Actualiti
  • Patrick Terry, Principal, Scientia  Advisors
  • David R. Jones, Director, Quality Assurance, Regulatory Affairs & Philips Business Excellence, Philips Home Monitoring

 

8:00pm-9:00pm:      Open Networking
item.name: Networking Event Focusing on the Life Science Convergent Technologies Landscape
